item.title: Platform Engineering: Building Internal Developer Platforms with ArgoCD and GitOps
item.description: Designing and implementing an internal developer platform using GitOps principles with ArgoCD. This project demonstrates how to create a self-service platform that enables developers to deploy applications with minimal operational overhead.

item.title: Advanced GitOps Patterns with ArgoCD: Multi-Cluster Deployments
item.description: Implementing advanced GitOps patterns for managing multi-cluster Kubernetes deployments with ArgoCD. Covers application sets, sync policies, and automated promotion workflows across development, staging, and production environments.
